title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 126.8 - Exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 126.8 - Exemptions

State Regulations

The required conditions contained in this Part shall not apply to trust agreements: (a) established by an alien insurer pursuant to the provisions of section 1315 of the New York Insurance Law; or
(b) entered into by unauthorized insurers pursuant to the provisions of: (1)
sections
27.14
and section
27.15
of this Title (Regulation No. 41); (2)
section
125.4
of this Title (Regulation No. 20); or
(3)
section
79.5
of this Title (Regulation No. 133). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
126.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
